mean_cn: v. 排除，取消抵押品的赎回权
mean_en: to take back property because the money owed for the property has not been paid
sentence: When we could not pay for our house any more, the bank had to foreclose on us.
sentence_trans: 当我们支付不起房子贷款后，银行就得取消抵押品的赎回权。
word_etyma: fore 强大，力量 + close关闭，结束 → foreclose阻止；排除
